comments.body:
So I am proposing to Jinja a set of data type tests to make type-related expressions easier and more strict. https://github.com/pallets/jinja/pull/824

I see that this could probably take advantage of it as well.

```yaml
    - int_to_str is string
    - str_to_int is integer
    - list_to_str is string
    - int_to_bool is boolean
    - str_true_to_bool is true
```
because currently doing something like:
```yaml
    - int_to_bool == True
```
would work fine for values 1 or 1.0

It is probably safer to write today:
```yaml
    - int_to_bool is sameas true
    - str_true_to_bool is sameas true
```
See https://github.com/dagwieers/ansible/blob/jinja2-type-tests/test/integration/targets/jinja2_tests/tasks/main.yml
